roleset.name: attend to a sound
roleset.note: LISTEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'listen' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries 30.3 35.5, no other framed members. (?) Comparison to 'hear'. (from listen.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: ``We watch the same indicators and listen to the same prognosticators.''

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Willliam Greaney said that the influence of the appeals court in New York ``will make insurers sit up and listen.''

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: His listening to loud music all night drove me crazy.
